short_summary: simultaneous interpretation services for a period of one year
description: The contract will cover simultaneous interpretation services from French to English. It is expected to be a renewal contract,
full_summary:
# Tender Announcement for Simultaneous Interpretation Services
### French to English Simultaneous Interpretation Services
#### Request for Proposal
The contract period for this tender is **contract award to March 31, 2028**. Health Canada is seeking a professional and high-quality simultaneous interpreter to provide interpretation services from French to English or from English to French. The proposed services must meet the requirements outlined in the Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA).

##### Required Quantities:
- Simultaneous interpretation services to be provided three (3) times every month on average (up to four (4) times per month) for videoconferences (e.g. Zoom or any other similar platform)
- Interpretation services must be provided by an accredited federal government interpreter to meet the standards outlined in the CETA

##### Eligibility Criteria:
\* The bidder must be accredited by the federal government with expertise in simultaneous interpretation
\* A minimum of three (3) years of relevant experience in simultaneous interpretation
\* Proven track record of delivering high-quality interpretation services

##### Proposal Submission:
Bidders must provide a comprehensive proposal that outlines their experience, qualifications, and equipment for providing simultaneous interpretation services. Submissions should be received by **April 13, 2023 at 14:00**. Late submissions will not be accepted.

##### Required Documents:
To access the tender documents, please visit the [Centralized Tender Listing and Business Intelligence (CTLBBI) system][1] and search for the solicitation number **1000234629A**.

[1]: https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/access-to-information/request-a-business-intelligence-report#offline

### Response to Request for Proposal:
For any clarifications or bid-related issues, please contact Sami Nouh at **613-941-2102** or email at **sami.nouh@hc-sc.gc.ca**.

**Tender Reference:** PW-23-01030039
**Amendment Reference:** 3
**Tender Notice Pub Date:** March 14, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** April 13, 2023
**Region:** National Capital Region (NCR)
**Country:** Canada
